\index{mr\_estimator() (in module proposal\_function\_definition)}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:proposal_function_definition.mr_estimator}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{proposal\_function\_definition.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{mr\_estimator}}}{\emph{activity\_matrix}, \emph{k\_limits}, \emph{bootstrapping=False}, \emph{fitting\_function=None}, \emph{method\_slopes=None}, \emph{subtr\_trial\_avg=False}, \emph{perform\_statistical\_tests=False}, \emph{plot=None}}{}
Estimates the MR Estimator from the activity matrix
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{activity\_matrix}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{A}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{ (}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{n}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{,}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{T}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{)}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{-shaped array}}) \textendash{} contains the activity which ones want to analyze. The first dimension denotes the trials, the second the time

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{bootstrapping}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{ or }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) \textendash{} Number of times, m, bootstrapping samples are taken from the trials in order to get a distribution of the
parameters. Defaults to False in which case no bootstrapping is performed.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{fitting\_function}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{\{"exponential"}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{"exponential\_with\_offset"}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{"complex"\}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) \textendash{} Name of the fitting function used to fit the correlation plot. Defaults to “exponential”.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{method\_slopes}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{\{"separate trials"}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{"concatenate trials"\}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) \textendash{} Whether to calculate the autocorrelation function over each trial, which induces a bias when the trial are too
short (the default) or over the all trials, which leads to an offset when the activity is not constant.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{subtr\_trial\_avg}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) \textendash{} whether to subtract the mean activity over the trials before calculating the autocorrelation plot.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{perform\_statistical\_tests}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) \textendash{} whether to perform statistical tests to ensure the validity of the estimator. If the tests aren’t passed, it
raises a Error with the name of the test which wasn’t passed.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{plot}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) \textendash{} path for autocorrelation plots to be saved.

\end{itemize}

\item[{Returns}] \leavevmode
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstylestrong{estimated\_parameters} (\sphinxstyleemphasis{A (w)-shaped array}) \textendash{} The w estimated parameters of the fitted function. When fitting function is exponential: {[}m, A{]},
exponential\_with\_offset: {[}m, A, O{]}, complex: {[}…..{]}

\item {} 
\sphinxstylestrong{bootstrapped\_parameters} (\sphinxstyleemphasis{A (m, w)-shaped array}) \textendash{} The resulting parameters of the bootstrapping. When bootstrapping is None, this return value is missing.

\end{itemize}


\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}
